snippet.title: Rubicon: Cubindom — Gameplay trailer
snippet.description:
What happens if you combine a Rubik's cube and a turn-based strategy? I bring to your attention the game Rubicon: Cubindom. Rotate the faces of the cube to help the brave knights reach the tower or connect the walls of the same color to restore peace in Cubindom.
Add to the wishlist on Steam. And subscribe to our social networks so that you don't miss important news!

#rubikscube #cube #cubing #3x3 #rubiks #rubixcube #speedcube #rubix #puzzle  #worldrecord #cubastic #4x4 #magic #funny #rubik’scube  #challenge #magiccube #puzzlecube #rubicon #Cubindom
